detail_desc: Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in soft, stretch imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, detachable tie belt at the waist and no fasteners. Patch front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in soft, stretch imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, detachable tie belt at the waist and no fasteners. Patch front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative metal studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a frill trim around the neckline, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in sturdy, textured organic cotton jersey. Top with buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Gently fitted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a button at the front. Flap front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently fitted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a button at the front. Flap front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers, and a single back vent. Lined.

Short, double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a wide collar, storm flap with a button, fixed shoulder tabs and a loose yoke at the back. Side pockets, a detachable belt at the waist, an adjustable tab and buckle at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Windbreaker in a crispy weave with a mesh-lined hood and a drawstring at the top and hem. Zip down the front, diagonal front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and short sleeves.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and short sleeves.
Gently fitted jacket in softly draping imitation suede with narrow notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.

Dress in soft, crinkled cotton jersey with an elasticated, gathered yoke at the top and an opening and shimmering button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a flounce over the shoulders. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in crinkled cotton jersey with a flounce around the neckline, press-studs at the back of the neck and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved blouse in crinkled cotton jersey with a flounce around the neckline, press-studs at the back of the neck and short slits in the sides.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with short cap sleeves. Pleats at the front of the neckline and a zip at the back. Detachable belt with a covered metal buckle at the waist, and a slit at the back. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with short cap sleeves. Pleats at the front of the neckline and a zip at the back. Detachable belt with a covered metal buckle at the waist, and a slit at the back. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with short cap sleeves. Pleats at the front of the neckline and a zip at the back. Detachable belt with a covered metal buckle at the waist, and a slit at the back. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with short cap sleeves. Pleats at the front of the neckline and a zip at the back. Detachable belt with a covered metal buckle at the waist, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Wide hairband in jersey with a decorative knot at the front and silicone inside to keep hair in place. Width 7 cm. The polyester content of the hairband is recycled.
Sports bag in woven fabric with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 18 cm. Height 37 cm. Width 45 cm.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with good air permeability to wick away moisture. Some of the polyester content of the tops is recycled.

Short coat in soft pile with a rounded collar that can be folded up, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Shirt in a washed linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a washed linen and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Oversized dress in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a patch front pocket. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
